summary: Working in a small team to develop and maintain internal tools, automation pipelines, and provide technical support to internal customers. Almost entirely Linux and open-source software used.

Maintained equipment and tools including resin and FDM 3D printers, a laser cutter, benchtop tools, and various hand tools. Advised incubator clients on prototype development, and aided with execution of prototype building. Helped CNC retrofit a manual milling machine.
Assisted the Strategic Communications Department with content creation, including graphics, videos, webpages, and other materials as required.

Developed business intelligence dashboards to automatically track and forecast revenue for Value Engineering projects. Worked closely with the Supply Chain Department to implement accurate shipment data in the above.

Part of the Aerospace & Defense Value Engineering team that worked on avionic modules and systems. Assisted with reading schematics, parsing part data, selecting qualified alternate components, and preparing design and testing proposals. Worked closely with the Supply Chain Department to to implement Value Engineering projects that reduced material cost and/or scrap rate. Developed dashboards to track value engineering project performance against key performance indicators.

Part of a team that assessed vulnerabilities in Payment Security and Customer Identity & Access Management. Conducted Root Cause Analysis on a series of cyber attacks involving the SWIFT financial messaging service. Automated processes using Microsoft InfoPath and Sharepoint.
Worked in a hands-on capacity with 1st year engineering students, teaching them CAD and Rapid Prototyping with 3D Printers.
